title: Sun Hung Kai Properties Full-Year Net Profit Fell 10%
text:
By Yifan Wang

Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. (0016.HK) said its net profit for year ended June dropped 10% due to a smaller fair-value gain on its investment properties.

Full-year net profit was 44.91 billion Hong Kong dollars (US$5.73 billion), compared with HK$49.95 billion during the same period a year earlier, the Hong Kong developer said Thursday.

Revenue for the period fell 0.4% to HK$85.30 billion as property sales in mainland China slumped 50%, the company said.

The company declared a final dividend of HK$3.70, taking the full-year dividend to HK$4.95, up 6.5% from the previous year, it said.

Sun Hung Kai said the recent social unrest in Hong Kong has weighed on its leasing business, and results in the coming years will likely be uncertain given the "current unprecedented challenging situation."
